ygData.subject: Tent.io, lack of HATEOAS and the cost of interop with existing systems
ygData.msgSnippet: Filed an issue with tent.io about the lack of HATEOAS in their API (which they call a protocol ) and the cost of interop with existing systems:

Filed an issue with tent.io about the lack of HATEOAS in their API
(which they call a "protocol") and the cost of interop with existing
systems:
https://github.com/tent/tent.io/issues/88

Posting this here to see what you'll think about this.
